7namespace bdsp::mappings

19 template <typename T>
20 inline T map_linear_norm_bipolar(const T val_norm, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
21 {
22 return (val_norm + static_cast<T>(1.0)) / static_cast<T>(2.0) * (out_hi - out_lo) + out_lo;
23 }
24
35 template <typename T>
36 inline T map_linear_norm(const T val_norm, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
37 {
38 return val_norm * (out_hi - out_lo) + out_lo;
39 }
40
53 template <typename T>
54 inline T map_linear(const T val, const T in_lo, const T in_hi, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
55 {
56 const T in_norm = (val - in_lo) / (in_hi - in_lo);
57 return map_linear_norm<T>(in_norm, out_lo, out_hi);
58 }
59
69 template <typename T>
70 inline T normalise(const T val, const T in_lo, const T in_hi)
71 {
72 return map_linear(val, in_lo, in_hi, static_cast<T>(0.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
73 }
74
84 template <typename T>
85 inline T normalise_bipolar(const T val, const T in_lo, const T in_hi)
86 {
87 return map_linear(val, in_lo, in_hi, static_cast<T>(-1.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
88 }
89
97 template <typename T>
98 inline T unipolar_to_bipolar(T x)
99 {
100 return map_linear_norm<T>(x, static_cast<T>(-1.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
101 }
102
110 template <typename T>
111 inline T bipolar_to_unipolar(T x)
112 {
113 return map_linear<T>(x, static_cast<T>(-1.0), static_cast<T>(1.0), static_cast<T>(0.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
114 }
115
127 inline float skew_norm(float val, float skew)
128 {
129 return powf(val, 1.0f / skew);
130 }
131
143 inline double skew_norm(double val, double skew)
144 {
145 return pow(val, 1.0 / skew);
146 }
147
157 inline float prewarp(const float freq, const float sample_rate)
158 {
159 const float wd = (float)constants::TWO_PI * freq;
160 const float wa = 2.0f * sample_rate * tanf(wd / (2.0f * sample_rate));
161
162 return wa;
163 }
164
174 inline double prewarp(const double freq, const double sample_rate)
175 {
176 const double wd = constants::TWO_PI * freq;
177 const double wa = 2.0 * sample_rate * tan(wd / (2.0 * sample_rate));
178
179 return wa;
180 }
181
